post_title: SOLD - T206 Ames Portrait SC 350/30 - SGC 5 Super Sharp.
post_content: Sold - T206 Red Ames Portrait SC 350/30 - SGC 5.  This is a super sharp card.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.5% to any agreed upon price to cover shipping.  Bob I.
